data.message:
PLEASE COME TO AMERICA AND DO A TOUR! I saw you at the first two anger management tours when I was a teenager. You were such a big inspiration to me. I listened to your records literally all day. I know every word to slim shady LP, marshal matters LP and Eminem show, which now embarrasses my kids lol. But you made me feel like it was ok to be weird, okay to be angry, and like my shitty life would someday be better because you did it so anyone could. I know this will never get to you, but thank you. 
Currently watching Defiant Ones..love seeing you on here. 
✌🏻

replies.message: You know he will come to Detroit.. well he better Lol I want to see him So bad...
I was the dumb teenage girl crying when he came on stage when I saw him in 2002ish..whenever that first anger management tour was. He's so good live
Edward Bulskis why are you on his fb page then. 😒
